Name: Benno Ludwigs
Comment: This ist so important! We really need more layout flexibility for individual content.

Name: Lorin Atzberger
Comment: This is exactly why I'm not going to buy a yearly subscription. Webflow seems nice but lacks features like crazy. The amount you can do with it is very limited so far.

Name: Quitos Pangea
Comment: Can't believe Webflow hasn't yet integrated this... I'm trying to have a travel blog with multiple images but all I can do is have one below each other instead of side-by-side. Unbelievable.
